parameters.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_listed, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'active' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active_count, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as failed_count FROM marketplace_listings WHERE user_id = $1 AND created_at >= $2::date AND created_at < ($2::date + INTERVAL '1 day')

SELECT COUNT(*) as sync_count, SUM(CASE WHEN success = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as success_count, SUM(CASE WHEN success = false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as error_count FROM stock_sync_logs WHERE user_id = $1 AND created_at >= $2::date AND created_at < ($2::date + INTERVAL '1 day')
SELECT COUNT(*) as error_count FROM n8n_execution_logs WHERE user_id = $1 AND status = 'error' AND created_at >= $2::date AND created_at < ($2::date + INTERVAL '1 day')

INSERT INTO daily_reports (user_id, report_date, listing_total, listing_active, listing_failed, sync_total, sync_success, sync_error, error_count, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2::date, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9, NOW()) ON CONFLICT (user_id, report_date) DO UPDATE SET listing_total = EXCLUDED.listing_total, listing_active = EXCLUDED.listing_active, listing_failed = EXCLUDED.listing_failed, sync_total = EXCLUDED.sync_total, sync_success = EXCLUDED.sync_success, sync_error = EXCLUDED.sync_error, error_count = EXCLUDED.error_count, created_at = NOW()
